verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֤י ׀ <S%H1697><s%> The words אָג֥וּר <S%H94><s%> of Agur בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יָקֶ֗ה <S%H3348><s%> of Jakeh הַמַּ֫שָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> [even] the prophecy נְאֻ֣ם <S%H5002><s%> spake הַ֭גֶּבֶר <S%H1397><s%> the man לְאִֽיתִיאֵ֑ל <S%H384><s%> unto Ithiel לְאִ֖יתִיאֵ֣ל <S%H384><s%> even unto Ithiel וְאֻכָֽל׃ <S%H401><s%> and Ucal

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Surely בַ֣עַר <S%H1198><s%> Surely I [am] more brutish אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מֵאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> than [any] man וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בִינַ֖ת <S%H998><s%> and have not the understanding אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> of a man לִֽי׃

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Neither לָמַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3925><s%> I neither learned חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> the knowledge קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> of the holy אֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> nor have

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who עָלָֽה־ <S%H5927><s%> Who hath ascended up שָׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H8064><s%> into heaven וַיֵּרַ֡ד <S%H3381><s%> or descended מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who אָֽסַף־ <S%H622><s%> ? who hath gathered ר֨וּחַ ׀ <S%H7307><s%> the wind בְּחָפְנָ֡יו <S%H2651><s%> fists מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who צָֽרַר־ <S%H6887><s%> has wrapped מַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H4325><s%> the waters בַּשִּׂמְלָ֗ה <S%H8071><s%> apparel מִ֭י <S%H4310><s%> Who הֵקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> has established כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> all the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> common מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long שְּׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> name וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long שֶּׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> is his name בְּ֝נ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> and what [is] his son's כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for תֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> if thou canst tell

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every אִמְרַ֣ת <S%H565><s%> Every word אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> of God צְרוּפָ֑ה <S%H6884><s%> [is] pure מָגֵ֥ן <S%H4043><s%> he [is] a shield ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> who לַֽחֹסִ֥ים <S%H2620><s%> unto them that put their trust בּֽוֹ׃

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תּ֥וֹסְףְּ <S%H3254><s%> Add עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto דְּבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> thou not unto his words פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or יוֹכִ֖יחַ <S%H3198><s%> lest he reprove בְּךָ֣ וְנִכְזָֽבְתָּ׃ <S%H3576><s%> thee and thou be found a liar פ

שְׁ֭תַּיִם <S%H8147><s%> Two שָׁאַ֣לְתִּי <S%H7592><s%> [things] have I required מֵאִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H853><s%> אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּמְנַ֥ע <S%H4513><s%> of thee deny מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before אָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> me [them] not before I die

שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <S%H7723><s%> from me vanity וּֽדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> act כָּזָ֡ב <S%H3577><s%> and lies הַרְחֵ֬ק <S%H7368><s%> Remove far מִמֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at רֵ֣אשׁ <S%H7389><s%> me neither poverty וָ֭עֹשֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> nor riches אַל־ <S%H408><s%> neither תִּֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> give לִ֑י הַ֝טְרִיפֵ֗נִי <S%H2963><s%> feed לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> me with food חֻקִּֽי׃ <S%H2706><s%> convenient

פֶּ֥ן <S%H6435><s%> I אֶשְׂבַּ֨ע ׀ <S%H7646><s%> Lest I be full וְכִחַשְׁתִּי֮ <S%H3584><s%> and deny וְאָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> [thee] and say מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God וּפֶֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest אִוָּרֵ֥שׁ <S%H3423><s%> cast out וְגָנַ֑בְתִּי <S%H1589><s%> and steal וְ֝תָפַ֗שְׂתִּי <S%H8610><s%> and take שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> of my God פ

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּלְשֵׁ֣ן <S%H3960><s%> Accuse עֶ֭בֶד <S%H5650><s%> not a servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about [אֲדֹנֹו כ] (אֲדֹנָ֑יו <S%H113><s%> your lord ק) פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or יְקַלֶּלְךָ֥ <S%H7043><s%> lest he curse וְאָשָֽׁמְתָּ׃ <S%H816><s%> thee and thou be found guilty

דּ֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [There is] a generation אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> their father יְקַלֵּ֑ל <S%H7043><s%> [that] curseth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֝מּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> their mother לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יְבָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> and doth not bless

דּ֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [There is] a generation טָה֣וֹר <S%H2889><s%> [that are] pure בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> in their own eyes וּ֝מִצֹּאָת֗וֹ <S%H6675><s%> from their filthiness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not רֻחָֽץ׃ <S%H7364><s%> and [yet] is not washed

דּ֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [There is] a generation מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long רָמ֣וּ <S%H7311><s%> O how lofty עֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> are their eyes וְ֝עַפְעַפָּ֗יו <S%H6079><s%> and their eyelids יִנָּשֵֽׂאוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> are lifted up

דּ֤וֹר ׀ <S%H1755><s%> [There is] a generation חֲרָב֣וֹת <S%H2719><s%> [are as] swords שִׁנָּיו֮ <S%H8127><s%> whose teeth וּֽמַאֲכָל֪וֹת <S%H3979><s%> [as] knives מְֽתַלְּעֹ֫תָ֥יו <S%H4973><s%> and their jaw teeth לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> to devour עֲנִיִּ֣ים <S%H6041><s%> the poor מֵאֶ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from off the earth וְ֝אֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <S%H34><s%> and the needy מֵאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> from [among] men פ

לַֽעֲלוּקָ֨ה ׀ <S%H5936><s%> The horseleach שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> hath two בָנוֹת֮ <S%H1323><s%> daughters הַ֤ב ׀ <S%H3051><s%> [crying] Give הַ֥ב <S%H3051><s%> give שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> There are three הֵ֭נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׂבַּ֑עְנָה <S%H7646><s%> [things that] are never satisfied אַ֝רְבַּ֗ע <S%H702><s%> [yea] four לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָ֥מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> [things] say הֽוֹן׃ <S%H1952><s%> not [It is] enough

שְׁאוֹל֮ <S%H7585><s%> The grave וְעֹ֪צֶ֫ר <S%H6115><s%> and the barren רָ֥חַם <S%H7356><s%> womb אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is never שָׂ֣בְעָה <S%H7646><s%> [that] is not filled מַּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> with water וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> and the fire לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> never אָ֥מְרָה <S%H559><s%> [that] saith הֽוֹן׃ <S%H1952><s%> not [It is] enough

עַ֤יִן ׀ <S%H5869><s%> The eye תִּֽלְעַ֣ג <S%H3932><s%> [that] mocketh לְאָב֮ <S%H1><s%> at [his] father וְתָב֪וּז <S%H936><s%> and despiseth לִֽיקֲּהַ֫ת־ <S%H3349><s%> to obey אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> [his] mother יִקְּר֥וּהָ <S%H5365><s%> shall pick it out עֹרְבֵי־ <S%H6158><s%> the ravens נַ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the valley וְֽיֹאכְל֥וּהָ <S%H398><s%> shall eat בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the young נָֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H5404><s%> eagles פ

שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> There be three הֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> There נִפְלְא֣וּ <S%H6381><s%> [things which] are too wonderful מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> are too [וְאַרְבָּע כ] (וְ֝אַרְבָּעָ֗ה <S%H702><s%> four ק) לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְדַעְתִּֽים׃ <S%H3045><s%> which I know

דֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way הַנֶּ֨שֶׁר ׀ <S%H5404><s%> of an eagle בַּשָּׁמַיִם֮ <S%H8064><s%> in the air דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way נָחָ֗שׁ <S%H5175><s%> of a serpent עֲלֵ֫י <S%H5921><s%> on צ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> upon a rock דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> the way אֳנִיָּ֥ה <S%H591><s%> of a ship בְלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> in the midst יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and the way גֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> of a man בְּעַלְמָֽה׃ <S%H5959><s%> with a maid

כֵּ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> This דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> Such [is] the way אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> woman מְנָ֫אָ֥פֶת <S%H5003><s%> of an adulterous אָ֭כְלָה <S%H398><s%> she eateth וּמָ֣חֲתָה <S%H4229><s%> and wipeth פִ֑יהָ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth וְ֝אָמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> and saith לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no פָעַ֥לְתִּי <S%H6466><s%> I have done אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> no wickedness פ

תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under שָׁ֭לוֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> For three רָ֣גְזָה <S%H7264><s%> is disquieted אֶ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [things] the earth וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under אַ֝רְבַּ֗ע <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> it תוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> [which] it cannot שְׂאֵֽת׃ <S%H5375><s%> bear

תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> Under עֶ֭בֶד <S%H5650><s%> For a servant כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when יִמְל֑וֹךְ <S%H4427><s%> when he reigneth וְ֝נָבָ֗ל <S%H5036><s%> and a fool כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <S%H7646><s%> when he is filled לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> with meat

תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under שְׂ֭נוּאָה <S%H8130><s%> For an odious כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when תִבָּעֵ֑ל <S%H1166><s%> [woman] when she is married וְ֝שִׁפְחָ֗ה <S%H8198><s%> and an handmaid כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תִירַ֥שׁ <S%H3423><s%> that is heir גְּבִרְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H1404><s%> to her mistress פ

אַרְבָּ֣עָה <S%H702><s%> There be four הֵ֭ם <S%H1992><s%> like קְטַנֵּי־ <S%H6996><s%> [things which are] little אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like חֲכָמִ֥ים <S%H2450><s%> wise מְחֻכָּמִֽים׃ <S%H2449><s%> but they [are] exceeding

הַ֭נְּמָלִים <S%H5244><s%> The ants עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> [are] a people לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not עָ֑ז <S%H5794><s%> not strong וַיָּכִ֖ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> yet they prepare בַקַּ֣יִץ <S%H7019><s%> in the summer לַחְמָֽם׃ <S%H3899><s%> their meat

שְׁ֭פַנִּים <S%H8227><s%> The conies עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> folk לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not עָצ֑וּם <S%H6099><s%> [are but] a feeble וַיָּשִׂ֖ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> yet make בַסֶּ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> in the rocks בֵּיתָֽם׃ <S%H1004><s%> they their houses

מֶ֭לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> have no king אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> have לָאַרְבֶּ֑ה <S%H697><s%> The locusts וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> yet go they forth חֹצֵ֣ץ <S%H2686><s%> all of them by bands כֻּלּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

שְׂ֭מָמִית <S%H8079><s%> The spider בְּיָדַ֣יִם <S%H3027><s%> with her hands תְּתַפֵּ֑שׂ <S%H8610><s%> taketh hold וְ֝הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּהֵ֣יכְלֵי <S%H1964><s%> palaces מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> and is in kings' פ

שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> There be three הֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> There מֵיטִ֣יבֵי <S%H3190><s%> well צָ֑עַד <S%H6806><s%> [things] which go וְ֝אַרְבָּעָ֗ה <S%H702><s%> yea four מֵיטִ֥בֵי <S%H3190><s%> are stately לָֽכֶת׃ <S%H1980><s%> walk

לַ֭יִשׁ <S%H3918><s%> A lion גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [which is] strongest בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> among beasts וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and does not יָ֝שׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> and turneth not away מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> for כֹֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> any

זַרְזִ֣יר <S%H2223><s%> greyhound מָתְנַ֣יִם <S%H4975><s%> rooster אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> also תָ֑יִשׁ <S%H8495><s%> an he goat וּ֝מֶ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and a king אַלְק֥וּם <S%H510><s%> against whom [there is] no rising up עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If נָבַ֥לְתָּ <S%H5034><s%> If thou hast done foolishly בְהִתְנַשֵּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> in lifting up וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if זַ֝מּ֗וֹתָ <S%H2161><s%> thyself or if thou hast thought evil יָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> [lay] thine hand לְפֶֽה׃ <S%H6310><s%> upon thy mouth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֪יץ <S%H4330><s%> Surely the churning חָלָ֡ב <S%H2461><s%> of milk י֘וֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> bringeth forth חֶמְאָ֗ה <S%H2529><s%> butter וּֽמִיץ־ <S%H4330><s%> and the wringing אַ֭ף <S%H639><s%> of the nose י֣וֹצִיא <S%H3318><s%> bringeth forth דָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> blood וּמִ֥יץ <S%H4330><s%> so the forcing אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <S%H639><s%> of wrath י֣וֹצִיא <S%H3318><s%> bringeth forth רִֽיב׃ <S%H7379><s%> strife פ
